name: Crank the Coal, Bob
description:
Test your teamwork in this two player local coop game. Your goal is to get your coal-driven castle(!?) to the end of the level as fast as possible without crashing into too many forests, rocks and people who don't seem to see you coming. The game is playable with one player, it is just not balanced for that.

This game was made in just over a week as a way to pass the time in a Corona locked down Norway before University starts.

Would love some feedback on what is fun and what is not!
